cells.text: In the QCD framework, there have been mainly two approaches to study the SSAs in high

so với thang đo không gây nhiễu λ $ _ {qcd} $ [17].

cells.text: It has been shown that these two approaches
cells.text_vi: Nó đã được chứng minh rằng hai cách tiếp cận này

cells.text: are consistent with each other for the SIDIS and Drell-Yan processes in the intermediate
